name: (Mugen Build Game Prototype)
description:
Hi Everyone!

Thank you so much for remaining loyal fans! Recently I have started learning how to use Mugen!  I now intend to completely create a whole new game using the mugen engine!

Here is the very first build! For now, I have 18 characters and 4 stages but I promise I will add more and more characters  and truly make it my own unique fighting game as it progresses!

If you would like to support my work and help me keep on making video games, please visit my patreon or pixiv fanbox page and subscribe! Any amount helps!

https://ckuriyama.fanbox.cc/

If you want to request for a commission, please contact me at kevinso2001@gmail.com so we can discuss details! 😁

Thanks!
developers: Kevin's Artwork, Video Games and Movies
